typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Company CR #} as string,
		{Company Transaction Type Arabic } as string,
		{Company Transaction Type English } as string,
		{Company Transaction type} as string,
		{PSMS - MoCI Transaction Types} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['ALL TRANSACTION TYPES.xlsx']) ~> crtrtypexlsx
source(output(
		id_transaction_type as short,
		ds_transaction_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT id_transaction_type,ds_transaction_type FROM DWH.DWL_TRANSACTION_TYPE where id_transaction_type>18 ',
	format: 'query',
	staged: true) ~> source2
crtrtypexlsx, source2 join({PSMS - MoCI Transaction Types} == ds_transaction_type,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ID_TRANSACTION_TYPE as integer,
		ID_CR_TRANSACTION_TYPE as string,
		DS_CR_TRANSACTION_TYPE_ENG as string,
		DS_CR_TRANSACTION_TYPE_ARB as string,
		ID_CR_ENTITY as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ID_TRANSACTION_TYPE = id_transaction_type,
		ID_CR_TRANSACTION_TYPE = {Company Transaction type},
		DS_CR_TRANSACTION_TYPE_ENG = {Company Transaction Type English },
		DS_CR_TRANSACTION_TYPE_ARB = {Company Transaction Type Arabic },
		ID_CR_ENTITY = {Company CR #}
	)) ~> sink1
